title: :pumpkin: Fall Emoji Update! :boo!:
post: With fall just around the corner, I thought it would be a good time to update the compatible emojis here on the Hivezine to add some Fall and Halloween spirit!<br><br>This update adds: <ul><li>:leaves‍: - :leaves:<li>:pumpkin‍: - :pumpkin:<li>:boo!‍: - :boo!:<li>:bat‍: - :bat:</ul>And of course...<ul><li>:pumpkin_spice_latte‍:<br><sup><sub>try it hehe</sup></sub></ul>Hope you enjoy! :happy:
